file_insights.app/globals.css: Added extensive CSS animations for landing page, including blob, float, fadeIn, and scrollDown keyframe animations
file_insights.app/page.tsx: Created a comprehensive, design-heavy landing page with multiple React components for features, testimonials, pricing, and an animated QR menu demo

patterns_discovered: Dark mode and responsive design considerations
gotchas_discovered: Complex landing page implementation requires multiple component types
Need for careful animation performance management
Managing dark mode color schemes across components
recommendations: Consider performance optimization for complex animations
Create a design system to maintain consistency across components
Implement responsive design testing for various device sizes
Use performance profiling tools to validate animation performance
